Verses: 1 erodhu Raajaavin Naatkalil Yoodheyaavilulla Bedhlagemile Yesu Pirandhapozhudhu, Kizhakkilirundhu Saasdhirigal Erusalemukku Vandhu,
2  Yoodharukku Raajaavaakap Pirandhirukkiravar Enge? Kizhakkile Avarudaiya Natchaththiraththaik Kandu, Avaraip Panindhu Kolla Vandhom Endraargal.
3 erodhuraajaa Adhaik Kettapozhudhu, Avanum Avanodukooda Erusalem Nagaraththaar Anaivarum Kalanginaargal.
4 avan Piradhaana Aasaariyar Janaththin Vedhapaarakar Ellaaraiyum Kooti Varachseydhu: Kiristhuvaanavar Enge Pirappaar Endru Avargalidaththil Visaariththaan.
5  Adharku Avargal: Yoodheyaavilulla Bedhlagemile Pirappaar; Adhenendraal:

6 yoodheyaa Dhesaththilulla Bedhlageme, Yoodhaavin Pirabugalil Nee Siriyadhalla; En Janamaagiya Isravelai Aalum Pirabu Unnidaththil Irundhu Purappaduvaar Endru, Theerkkadharisiyinaal Ezhudhappattirukkiradhu Endraargal.
7 appozhudhu Erodhu, Saasdhirigalai Ragasiyamaai Azhaiththu, Natchaththiram Kaanappatta Kaalaththaik Kuriththu Avargalidaththil Thittamaai Visaariththu:
8 neengal Poi, Pillaiyaikkuriththuth Thittamaai Visaariyungal; Neengal Adhaik Kandapinbu, Naanum Vandhu Adhaip Panindhu Kollumpadi Enakku Ariviyungal Endru Solli, Avargalaip Bedhlagemukku Anuppinaan.
9 raajaa Sonnadhai Avargal Kettup Pogaiyil, Idho, Avargal Kizhakkile Kanda Natchaththiram Pillai Irundha Sthalaththirkumel Vandhu Nirkumvaraikkum Avargalukkumun Sendradhu.
10 avargal Andha Natchaththiraththai Kanda Podhu, Migundha Aanandha Sandhoshamadaindhaargal.

11 avargal Andha Veettukkul Piravesiththu, Pillaiyaiyum Adhin Thaayaagiya Mariyaalaiyum Kandu, Saashtaangamaai Vizhundhu Adhaip Panindhukondu, Thangal Pokkishangalaith Thirandhu, Ponnaiyum Thoopavarkkaththaiyum Vellaippolaththaiyum Adharkuk Kaanikkaiyaaga Vaiththaargal.
12 pinbu, Avargal Erodhinidaththirkuth Thirumpip Pogavendaam Endru Soppanaththil Dhevanaal Echcharikkappattu, Veru Vazhiyaaith Thangal Dhesaththirkuth Thirumbipponaargal.

13 avargal Ponapinbu, Karththarudaiya Thoodhan Soppanaththil Yoseppukkuk Kaanappattu: Erodhu Pillaiyaik Kolaiseyyath Theduvaan; Aadhalaal Nee Ezhundhu, Pillaiyaiyum Adhin Thaayaiyum Koottikkondu Ekipdhukku Odippoi, Naan Unakku Sollum Varaikkum Angeye Iru Endraan.
14 avan Ezhundhu, Iravile Pillaiyaiyum Adhin Thaayaiyum Koottikkondu, Egipdhukkup Purappattup Poi,

15  Erodhin Maranapariyandham Ange Irundhaan. Egipdhilirundhu Ennudaiya Kumaaranai Varavazhaiththen Endru, Theerkkadharisiyin Moolamaaik Karththaraal Uraikkappattadhu Niraiverumpadi Ippadi Nadandhadhu.

16 appozhudhu Erodhu Thaan Saasthirigalaal Vanjikkappattadhaik Kandu, Migundha Kobamadaindhu, Aatkalai Anuppi, Thaan Saasthirigalidaththil Thittamaai Visaariththa Kaalaththinpadiye, Bedhlagemilum Adhin Sagala Ellaikalilumirundha Irandu Vayadhukkutpatta Ellaa Aanpillaigalaiyum Kolaiseydhaan.
17 pulampalum Azhukaiyum Migundha Thukkangondaadalumaagiya Kookkural Raamaavile Ketkappattadhu; Raakel Than Pillaigalukkaaka Azhudhu, Avaigal Illaadhapadiyaal Aarudhaladaiyaadhirukkiraal Endru,
18  Eremiyaa Theerkkadharisiyinaal Uraikkappattadhu Appozhudhu Niraiveritru.
19 erodhu Irandhapinbu, Karththarudaiya Thoodhan Egipdhile Yoseppukku Soppanaththil Kaanappattu:
20  Nee Ezhundhu, Pillaiyaiyum Adhin Thaayaiyum Koottikkondu Isravel Dhesaththukkup Po; Pillaiyin Piraananai Vaangaththedinavargal Irandhu Ponaargal Endraan.
21 avan Ezhundhu, Pillaiyaiyum Adhin Thaayaiyum Koottikkondu Isravel Dhesaththukku Vandhaan.

22 aagilum, Arkelaayu Than Thagappanaagiya Erodhin Pattaththukku Vandhu, Yoodheyaavil Arasaalugiraan Endru Kelvippattu, Ange Pogap Bayandhaan. Appozhudhu Avan Soppanaththil Dhevanaal Echcharikkappattu, Galileyaa Naattin Purangalile Vilagippoi,
23  Naasareththu Ennum Oorile Vandhu Vaasam Panninaan. Nasareyan Ennappaduvaar Endru, Theerkkadharisigalaal Uraikkappattadhu Niraiverumpadi Ippadi Nadanthadhu.
